revision.text: occurrent a surgical operation as processual context for a nosocomical infection the life of an organism the most interesting part of Van Gogh's life the spatiotemporal context occupied by a process of cellular meiosis the spatiotemporal region occupied by the development of a cancer tumor An entitythat has temporal parts and that happens, unfolds or develops through time. Sometimes also called perdurants. perdurant {{ #viki:pageTitles=occurrent}}[http://localhost/mediawiki-1.34.1/index.php/http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000001 is a subclass from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000001 ]
